security_audit.summary: This is a pure text-based role-playing script with no executable code. The SKILL.md file contains only YAML frontmatter and Markdown narrative content describing an interactive fiction scenario. No file system access, network calls, command execution, or environment variable access capabilities exist.

content.value_statement: Guide astronaut Stella through scientific exploration of an alien planet's ecosystem. Make research decisions, identify dangerous and useful plants, and uncover the secrets of Gaia's bioluminescent flora in this interactive adventure.
actual_capabilities: Guide Stella's scientific research decisions in alien environment
Explore bioluminescent plants, giant trees, strange fruits, and carnivorous species
Identify useful resources like natural antibiotics, rope-making vines, and insulating moss
Experience branching narrative with three possible endings based on player choices
Learn plant biology concepts through immersive dialogue and observations
Encounter dangers including toxic substances and predatory plants
limitations: No code execution or tool integration - pure narrative roleplay experience
Pre-scripted responses - not a general-purpose assistant
Requires user to provide dialogue and make choices for Stella
Single-chapter story focused on plant exploration theme only

use_cases.title: Immersive Alien World Exploration
use_cases.description: Experience detailed scientific exploration of an alien ecosystem through interactive storytelling and character dialogue

use_cases.title: Study Interactive Narrative Structure
use_cases.description: Learn how to craft branching dialogue systems and character-driven decision mechanics in text-based games

use_cases.title: Practice English Through Roleplay
use_cases.description: Engage with natural English dialogue while exploring an exciting science fiction story

prompt_templates.title: Start the Chapter
prompt_templates.scenario: Begin the alien plant research adventure
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella is ready to study the alien plants. Ask her to tell you about what she observes and guide her research choices.

prompt_templates.title: Choose Research Path
prompt_templates.scenario: Select which plant category to study first
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella is waiting for your advice on which plant type to investigate first: glowing plants, giant trees, strange fruits, or ground-level plants.

prompt_templates.title: Handle Dangerous Encounter
prompt_templates.prompt: A carnivorous plant is attacking Stella! Help her stay calm, avoid the sticky vines, and decide whether to study or escape.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze Sample Results
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella has collected plant samples and data. Ask her to explain what she found and how it could help survival on Gaia.

best_practices: Ask Stella specific questions about her observations to unlock detailed scientific explanations
Guide her toward careful testing before sampling unknown plants to avoid the toxic fruit scenario
Encourage her to balance exploration enthusiasm with safety awareness for the best story outcome
anti_patterns: Don't simply tell Stella what to do without engaging with the narrative context
Avoid rushing through dialogue without reading her scientific observations
Don't ignore the branching consequences of choices on story outcomes

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Works as a roleplay prompt template across these platforms.

faq.question: How long does this chapter take?
faq.answer: Approximately 25-30 minutes for a complete session with all exploration paths and three different endings.

faq.question: Can I combine this with other chapters?
faq.answer: Yes. This is Chapter 4 in a 12-chapter series. Recommended pairings include cooking-adventure, daily-science, and ancient-ruins.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains only text prompts and narrative content. No data is collected, stored, or transmitted.

faq.question: What if Stella encounters a dangerous situation?
faq.answer: Stella will narrate the situation. Guide her with survival advice. Some choices lead to dangerous outcomes but the story is designed to be survivable.

faq.question: How is this different from other roleplay skills?
faq.answer: Features scientifically-grounded descriptions, three distinct story endings, Chinese-English bilingual dialogue, and structured research mechanics.
